name: Avatara Services
tag_list: contract-management, metrics, dashboard, quality-control, invoicing, subcontractor, flow-management, service-performance, software
overview:
Avatara Services is a prime federal contracting company that performs various service contracts with many federal agencies and offers IT solutions for commercial and government partners.

It has developed a proprietary Contract Management System (CMS) that automates much of the quality control/assurance and financial reporting/invoicing involved with government contracting and subcontractor management.

This CMS provides a platform for metrics dashboards which can be created from the resulting data flow to provide real time project management insight.

Avatara Services also offers queuing analysis and customer/patient flow management to address service times, staff productivity, and bottlenecks with real time metrics.
